action.action-desc: Mr. Garamendi introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Afghan Allies Protection Act to provide special immigrant visas to certain Fulbright Scholars, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Immigrant Visas for Afghan Fulbright Scholars Act of 2023.

section.header: Special immigrant visas for certain fulbright scholars

subsection.header: Special immigrant visas for certain scholars
subsection.text: Section 602(b) of the Afghan Allies Protection Act of 2009 (8 U.S.C. 1101 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of paragraph (2) and inserting an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), (C), or (D) of paragraph (2);

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A)(iii), by striking subparagraph (D) and inserting subparagraph (E);
by redesignating subparagraphs (B), (C), (D), (E), and (F) as subparagraphs (C), (D), (E), (F), and (G), respectively;
by inserting after subparagraph (A) the following:

subparagraph.header: Fulbright and other scholars as principal alien
subparagraph.text: An alien is described in this subparagraph if the alien is a national or citizen of Afghanistan and was selected between October 7, 2001 and August 31, 2023, to participate in—

clause.text: the J. William Fulbright Educational Exchange Program authorized under section 102 of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2452(a)(1)) including the Fulbright Scholar-in-Residence Grants and the Fulbright Foreign Language Teaching Assistant Program;
the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Program pursuant to section 112(a)(2) of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2460(a)(2));
the International Visitor Leadership Program pursuant to section 112(a)(3) of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2460(a)(3)); or

any other educational or cultural exchange activity administered by the Secretary of State pursuant to sections 102 or 112 of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2452; 22 U.S.C. 2460) for which the Secretary determines that a participating alien is eligible for a special immigrant visa under this paragraph.

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (C), as redesignated by subparagraph (B), by striking subparagraph (A) and inserting subparagraph (A) or (B); and
in subparagraph (D), as redesignated by subparagraph (B), by striking subparagraph (A) each place it appears and inserting subparagraph (A) or (B);

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4)(C), by striking an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of paragraph (2) and inserting an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), (C), or (D) of paragraph (2);
in paragraph (5), by striking an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of paragraph (2) and inserting an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), (C), or (D) of paragraph (2);
in paragraph (6), by striking an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of paragraph (2) and inserting an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), (C), or (D) of paragraph (2); and
in paragraph (9), by striking an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), or (C) of paragraph (2) and inserting an alien described in subparagraph (A), (B), (C), or (D) of paragraph (2).

subsection.text: Section 602(b)(3) of the Afghan Allies Protection Act of 2009 (8 U.S.C. 1101 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (B), (C), (D), (E), and (F) as subparagraphs (C), (D), (E), (F), and (G), respectively;
in subparagraph (A), by striking (C) and inserting (D);
by inserting after subparagraph (A) the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: An alien provided immigrant status pursuant to subparagraph (2)(B) shall not be counted against any numerical limitation under this section, or section 201, 202, 203, or 207 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1151, 1152, 1153, and 1157).

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (E), as redesignated by paragraph (1),—

subparagraph.text: by striking paragraph (C) and inserting subparagraph (D); and
by striking subsection (b)(2)(D) and inserting paragraph (2)(E);

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (F), as redesignated by paragraph (1),—

subparagraph.text: by striking paragraph (2)(D) and inserting paragraph (2)(E); and
by striking subparagraph (D) each place that it appears and inserting subparagraph (E); and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (G), as redesignated by paragraph (1)—

subparagraph.text: by striking subparagraph (D) and inserting subparagraph (E);
by striking subparagraphs (D) and (E) and inserting subparagraphs (E) and (F); and
in clause (ii), by striking paragraph (2)(D) and inserting paragraph (2)(E).
